successes.title: Blink: Wire-Free HD Home Monitoring & Alert System
successes.description: Blink: the first ultra-affordable, totally wire-free smart HD home monitoring and alert system.

Pledges.description:
Blink Supporter:
Receive product and project updates, plus one of the ISI-108 chips that drives Blink's one-of-a-kind functionality!
Blink Super Early Adopter: Thanks for being among our earliest and most enthusiastic supporters! Receive one Blink unit plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.

Blink Super Early Adopter International: NEW for our international backers. Thanks for being among our earliest and most enthusiastic supporters! Receive one Blink unit plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.
Blink Early Adopter: If you missed out on our Super Early Adopter package, it's not too late! Receive one Blink unit plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.
Receive one Blink unit plus Sync Module.

Blink Super Early Adopter Starter System: Thanks for being among our earliest and most enthusiastic supporters! Receive the perfect starter kit for a cozy home or apartment - two Blink units plus Sync Module - for $30 less than it will retail for! No monthly fees.

Blink Super Early Adopter Starter System International: NEW for our international backers. Thanks for being among our earliest and most enthusiastic supporters! Receive the perfect starter kit for a cozy home or apartment - two Blink units plus Sync Module - for $30 less than it will retail for! No monthly fees.

Blink Early Adopter Starter System: If you missed out on our Super Early Adopter package, it's not too late! Receive the perfect starter kit for a cozy home or apartment - two Blink units plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.
Blink Starter System: Receive two Blink units plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.
Blink Beta Membership: Be among the first  backers to receive a Blink system, plus get exclusive access to our Beta feedback program. Includes two Blink units plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.
Blink Home System: Receive three Blink units plus Sync Module. No monthly fees.

Blink Alpha Program: In December, we'll ship our very first units out for testing and feedback from members of our Alpha program. Your experiences and input will help us ensure that we're shipping the best possible product in March and May 2015. Receive one Blink unit and Sync Module in December, as well as a two-camera system and Sync Module when Beta units ship! Note: backers for this tier will be required to sign an NDA in advance of receiving Alpha units.
Blink Home+ System: Receive five Blink units plus Sync Module. Perfect for larger homes! No monthly fees.
Blink Home+ System International: NEW for our international backers. Receive five Blink units plus Sync Module. Perfect for larger homes! No monthly fees.
Blink Starter System Reseller Package: Be among our first partners, and help us introduce Blink to the world! Receive 10 two-unit Blink Starter Systems.
Blink Home System Reseller Package: Be among our first partners, and help us introduce Blink to the world! Receive 10 three-unit Blink Home Systems.
Blink Home+ System Reseller Package: Be among our first partners, and help us introduce Blink to the world! Receive 10 five-unit Blink Home+ Systems.
